00010 const char * const compressed_matrix_align4_vec_mul = 
00011 "__kernel void vec_mul(\n"
00012 "          __global const unsigned int * row_indices,\n"
00013 "          __global const uint4 * column_indices, \n"
00014 "          __global const float4 * elements,\n"
00015 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00016 "          __global float * result,\n"
00017 "          unsigned int size)\n"
00018 "{ \n"
00019 "  float dot_prod;\n"
00020 "  unsigned int start, next_stop;\n"
00021 "  uint4 col_idx;\n"
00022 "  float4 tmp_vec;\n"
00023 "  float4 tmp_entries;\n"
00024 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < size; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00025 "  {\n"
00026 "    dot_prod = 0.0f;\n"
00027 "    start = row_indices[row] / 4;\n"
00028 "    next_stop = row_indices[row+1] / 4;\n"
00029 "    for (unsigned int i = start; i < next_stop; ++i)\n"
00030 "    {\n"
00031 "      col_idx = column_indices[i];\n"
00032 "      tmp_entries = elements[i];\n"
00033 "      tmp_vec.x = vector[col_idx.x];\n"
00034 "      tmp_vec.y = vector[col_idx.y];\n"
00035 "      tmp_vec.z = vector[col_idx.z];\n"
00036 "      tmp_vec.w = vector[col_idx.w];\n"
00037 "      dot_prod += dot(tmp_entries, tmp_vec);\n"
00038 "    }\n"
00039 "    result[row] = dot_prod;\n"
00040 "  }\n"
00041 "};\n"
00042 ; //compressed_matrix_align4_vec_mul

00044 const char * const compressed_matrix_align1_lu_forward = 
00045 " \n"
00046 "// compute y in Ly = z for incomplete LU factorizations of a sparse matrix in compressed format\n"
00047 "__kernel void lu_forward(\n"
00048 "          __global const unsigned int * row_indices,\n"
00049 "          __global const unsigned int * column_indices, \n"
00050 "          __global const float * elements,\n"
00051 "          __local  int * buffer,                              \n"
00052 "          __local  float * vec_entries,   //a memory block from vector\n"
00053 "          __global float * vector,\n"
00054 "          unsigned int size) \n"
00055 "{\n"
00056 "  int waiting_for; //block index that must be finished before the current thread can start\n"
00057 "  unsigned int waiting_for_index;\n"
00058 "  int block_offset;\n"
00059 "  unsigned int col;\n"
00060 "  unsigned int row;\n"
00061 "  unsigned int row_index_end;\n"
00062 "  \n"
00063 "  //backward substitution: one thread per row in blocks of get_global_size(0)\n"
00064 "  for (unsigned int block_num = 0; block_num <= size / get_global_size(0); ++block_num)\n"
00065 "  {\n"
00066 "    block_offset = block_num * get_global_size(0);\n"
00067 "    row = block_offset + get_global_id(0);\n"
00068 "    buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 0; //set flag to 'undone'\n"
00069 "    waiting_for = -1;\n"
00070 "    if (row < size)\n"
00071 "    {\n"
00072 "      vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] = vector[row];\n"
00073 "      waiting_for_index = row_indices[row];\n"
00074 "      row_index_end = row_indices[row+1];\n"
00075 "    }\n"
00076 "    \n"
00077 "    if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00078 "      buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 1;\n"
00079 "    //try to eliminate all lines in the block. \n"
00080 "    //in worst case scenarios, in each step only one line can be substituted, thus loop\n"
00081 "    for (unsigned int k = 0; k<get_global_size(0); ++k)\n"
00082 "    {\n"
00083 "      barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00084 "      if (row < size) //valid index?\n"
00085 "      {\n"
00086 "        if (waiting_for >= 0)\n"
00087 "        {\n"
00088 "          if (buffer[waiting_for] == 1)\n"
00089 "            waiting_for = -1;\n"
00090 "        }\n"
00091 "        \n"
00092 "        if (waiting_for == -1) //substitution not yet done, check whether possible\n"
00093 "        {\n"
00094 "          //check whether reduction is possible:\n"
00095 "          for (unsigned int j = waiting_for_index; j < row_index_end; ++j)\n"
00096 "          {\n"
00097 "            col = column_indices[j];\n"
00098 "            if (col < block_offset) //index valid, but not from current block\n"
00099 "              vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] -= elements[j] * vector[col];\n"
00100 "            else if (col < row)  //index is from current block\n"
00101 "            {\n"
00102 "              if (buffer[col - block_offset] == 0) //entry is not yet calculated\n"
00103 "              {\n"
00104 "                waiting_for = col - block_offset;\n"
00105 "                waiting_for_index = j;\n"
00106 "                break;\n"
00107 "              }\n"
00108 "              else  //updated entry is available in shared memory:\n"
00109 "                vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] -= elements[j] * vec_entries[col - block_offset];\n"
00110 "            }\n"
00111 "          }\n"
00112 "          \n"
00113 "          if (waiting_for == -1)  //this row is done\n"
00114 "          {\n"
00115 "            buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 1;\n"
00116 "            waiting_for = -2; //magic number: thread is finished\n"
00117 "          }\n"
00118 "        } \n"
00119 "      } //row < size\n"
00120 "      else\n"
00121 "        buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 1; //work done (because there is no work to be done at all...)\n"
00122 "      ///////// check whether all threads are done. If yes, exit loop /////////////\n"
00123 "      \n"
00124 "      if (buffer[get_global_id(0)] == 0)\n"
00125 "        buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 0;\n"
00126 "      barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00127 "      \n"
00128 "      if (buffer[get_global_size(0)] > 0)  //all threads break this loop simultaneously\n"
00129 "        break;\n"
00130 "      if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00131 "        buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 1;\n"
00132 "    } //for k\n"
00133 "    \n"
00134 "    //write to vector:\n"
00135 "    if (row < size)\n"
00136 "      vector[row] = vec_entries[get_global_id(0)];\n"
00137 "    \n"
00138 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00139 "  } //for block_num\n"
00140 "}\n"
00141 ; //compressed_matrix_align1_lu_forward

00143 const char * const compressed_matrix_align1_lu_backward = 
00144 "// compute x in Ux = y for incomplete LU factorizations of a sparse matrix in compressed format\n"
00145 "__kernel void lu_backward(\n"
00146 "          __global const unsigned int * row_indices,\n"
00147 "          __global const unsigned int * column_indices, \n"
00148 "          __global const float * elements,\n"
00149 "          __local  int * buffer,                              \n"
00150 "          __local  float * vec_entries,   //a memory block from vector\n"
00151 "          __global float * vector,\n"
00152 "          unsigned int size) \n"
00153 "{\n"
00154 "  int waiting_for; //block index that must be finished before the current thread can start\n"
00155 "  unsigned int waiting_for_index;\n"
00156 "  unsigned int block_offset;\n"
00157 "  unsigned int col;\n"
00158 "  unsigned int row;\n"
00159 "  unsigned int row_index_end;\n"
00160 "  float diagonal_entry = 42;\n"
00161 "  \n"
00162 "  //forward substitution: one thread per row in blocks of get_global_size(0)\n"
00163 "  for (int block_num = size / get_global_size(0); block_num > -1; --block_num)\n"
00164 "  {\n"
00165 "    block_offset = block_num * get_global_size(0);\n"
00166 "    row = block_offset + get_global_id(0);\n"
00167 "    buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 0; //set flag to 'undone'\n"
00168 "    waiting_for = -1;\n"
00169 "    \n"
00170 "    if (row < size)\n"
00171 "    {\n"
00172 "      vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] = vector[row];\n"
00173 "      waiting_for_index = row_indices[row];\n"
00174 "      row_index_end = row_indices[row+1];\n"
00175 "      diagonal_entry = column_indices[waiting_for_index];\n"
00176 "    }\n"
00177 "    \n"
00178 "    if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00179 "       buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 1;\n"
00180 "    //try to eliminate all lines in the block. \n"
00181 "    //in worst case scenarios, in each step only one line can be substituted, thus loop\n"
00182 "    for (unsigned int k = 0; k<get_global_size(0); ++k)\n"
00183 "    {\n"
00184 "      barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00185 "      if (row < size) //valid index?\n"
00186 "      {\n"
00187 "        if (waiting_for >= 0)\n"
00188 "        {\n"
00189 "          if (buffer[waiting_for] == 1)\n"
00190 "            waiting_for = -1;\n"
00191 "        }\n"
00192 "        \n"
00193 "        if (waiting_for == -1) //substitution not yet done, check whether possible\n"
00194 "        {\n"
00195 "          //check whether reduction is possible:\n"
00196 "          for (unsigned int j = waiting_for_index; j < row_index_end; ++j)\n"
00197 "          {\n"
00198 "            col = column_indices[j];\n"
00199 "            barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00200 "            if (col >= block_offset + get_global_size(0))  //index valid, but not from current block\n"
00201 "              vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] -= elements[j] * vector[col];\n"
00202 "            else if (col > row)  //index is from current block\n"
00203 "            {\n"
00204 "              if (buffer[col - block_offset] == 0) //entry is not yet calculated\n"
00205 "              {\n"
00206 "                waiting_for = col - block_offset;\n"
00207 "                waiting_for_index = j;\n"
00208 "                break;\n"
00209 "              }\n"
00210 "              else  //updated entry is available in shared memory:\n"
00211 "                vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] -= elements[j] * vec_entries[col - block_offset];\n"
00212 "            }\n"
00213 "            else if (col == row)\n"
00214 "              diagonal_entry = elements[j];\n"
00215 "          }\n"
00216 "          \n"
00217 "          if (waiting_for == -1)  //this row is done\n"
00218 "          {\n"
00219 "            if (row == 0)\n"
00220 "              vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] /= elements[0];\n"
00221 "            else\n"
00222 "              vec_entries[get_global_id(0)] /= diagonal_entry;\n"
00223 "            buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 1;\n"
00224 "            waiting_for = -2; //magic number: thread is finished\n"
00225 "          }\n"
00226 "        } \n"
00227 "      } //row < size\n"
00228 "      else\n"
00229 "        buffer[get_global_id(0)] = 1; //work done (because there is no work to be done at all...)\n"
00230 "      \n"
00231 "      ///////// check whether all threads are done. If yes, exit loop /////////////\n"
00232 "      if (buffer[get_global_id(0)] == 0)\n"
00233 "        buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 0;\n"
00234 "      barrier(CLK_LOCAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00235 "      \n"
00236 "      if (buffer[get_global_size(0)] > 0)  //all threads break the loop simultaneously\n"
00237 "        break;\n"
00238 "      if (get_global_id(0) == 0)\n"
00239 "        buffer[get_global_size(0)] = 1;\n"
00240 "    } //for k\n"
00241 "    if (row < size)\n"
00242 "      vector[row] = vec_entries[get_global_id(0)];\n"
00243 "      //vector[row] = diagonal_entry;\n"
00244 "    \n"
00245 "    //if (row == 0)\n"
00246 "      //vector[0] = diagonal_entry;\n"
00247 "      //vector[0] = elements[0];\n"
00248 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00249 "  } //for block_num\n"
00250 "}\n"
00251 ; //compressed_matrix_align1_lu_backward
00252 
00253 const char * const compressed_matrix_align1_vec_mul = 
00254 "__kernel void vec_mul(\n"
00255 "          __global const unsigned int * row_indices,\n"
00256 "          __global const unsigned int * column_indices, \n"
00257 "          __global const float * elements,\n"
00258 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00259 "          __global float * result,\n"
00260 "          unsigned int size) \n"
00261 "{ \n"
00262 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < size; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00263 "  {\n"
00264 "    float dot_prod = 0.0f;\n"
00265 "    for (unsigned int i = row_indices[row]; i < row_indices[row+1]; ++i)\n"
00266 "      dot_prod += elements[i] * vector[column_indices[i]];\n"
00267 "    result[row] = dot_prod;\n"
00268 "  }\n"
00269 "};\n"
00270 "\n"
00271 ; //compressed_matrix_align1_vec_mul

00273 const char * const compressed_matrix_align8_vec_mul = 
00274 "__kernel void vec_mul(\n"
00275 "          __global const unsigned int * row_indices,\n"
00276 "          __global const uint8 * column_indices, \n"
00277 "          __global const float8 * elements,\n"
00278 "          __global const float * vector,  \n"
00279 "          __global float * result,\n"
00280 "          unsigned int size)\n"
00281 "{ \n"
00282 "  float dot_prod;\n"
00283 "  unsigned int start, next_stop;\n"
00284 "  uint8 col_idx;\n"
00285 "  float8 tmp_vec;\n"
00286 "  float8 tmp_entries;\n"
00287 "  for (unsigned int row = get_global_id(0); row < size; row += get_global_size(0))\n"
00288 "  {\n"
00289 "    dot_prod = 0.0f;\n"
00290 "    start = row_indices[row] / 8;\n"
00291 "    next_stop = row_indices[row+1] / 8;\n"
00292 "    for (unsigned int i = start; i < next_stop; ++i)\n"
00293 "    {\n"
00294 "      col_idx = column_indices[i];\n"
00295 "      tmp_entries = elements[i];\n"
00296 "      tmp_vec.s0 = vector[col_idx.s0];\n"
00297 "      tmp_vec.s1 = vector[col_idx.s1];\n"
00298 "      tmp_vec.s2 = vector[col_idx.s2];\n"
00299 "      tmp_vec.s3 = vector[col_idx.s3];\n"
00300 "      tmp_vec.s4 = vector[col_idx.s4];\n"
00301 "      tmp_vec.s5 = vector[col_idx.s5];\n"
00302 "      tmp_vec.s6 = vector[col_idx.s6];\n"
00303 "      tmp_vec.s7 = vector[col_idx.s7];\n"
00304 "      dot_prod += dot(tmp_entries.lo, tmp_vec.lo);\n"
00305 "      dot_prod += dot(tmp_entries.hi, tmp_vec.hi);\n"
00306 "    }\n"
00307 "    result[row] = dot_prod;\n"
00308 "    barrier(CLK_GLOBAL_MEM_FENCE);\n"
00309 "  }\n"
00310 "};\n"
00311 ; //compressed_matrix_align8_vec_mul
